fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to roleblock a random player who would visit a player of your choice tonight.
- Use 2 bees to redirect a player to a player of your choice.
- Use 3 bees to learn the roles and names of all players who a player of your choice visits tonight, or their role if they don't visit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
